metadata.title: CVE-2018-19198 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriQuery.c allows anout-of-bounds write via a uriComposeQuery* or uriComposeQueryEx* functionbecause the '&' character is mishandled in certain contexts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19198` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.9.3-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: uriparser package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.3-2').
